title: Forbidden Ballad - Rock My World
description: Carly Michaels is on the brink of success in the country music industry, but her world comes crashing down when she catches her fiance, who happens to be her band mate, cheating on her. Humiliated, she flees Nashville, and finds herself adrift and confused in New York City. Now an outcast in the music world, she can only get work singing backup for a world-renowned rock group.When Carly meets Leo Nash, the gorgeous but womanizing lead singer of Cobalt, she wants nothing to do with him. But Leo has other plans. Used to always getting what he wants, Leo pursues Carly, unaware of the baggage she's left behind in Nashville. He's thrown for a loop when Carly actually makes him work for her affections and the sexual tension between the two just keeps getting hotter. Can Carly resist sexy, forbidden Leo, especially when the band goes on tour? And can Leo keep his past from ruining his future with Carly? Leo's determined to put his bad boy ways behind him to pursue a good girl like Carly, but is it possible?* New Adult Romance Novel* contains strong language, sexual situations and adult themes. Intended for mature readers.
author: Reese Summers
